QueryViewSpec.Name: D2 Campaign Business Process Results Query
QueryViewSpec.Description: Query to display results of D2 Campaign business process
QueryViewSpec.Author: Memphis Sellers

ViewImplementation.ViewSQL: SELECT c.ID, r.SPONSORLOOKUPID, r.D2CAMPAIGNDATE, r.DATEADDED, case when r.CAMPAIGNTYPE = 0 then 'Cash' when r.CAMPAIGNTYPE = 1 then 'EFT Active' when r.CAMPAIGNTYPE = 2 then 'EFT Held Credit Card' when r.CAMPAIGNTYPE = 3 then 'EFT Held Direct Debit' when r.CAMPAIGNTYPE = 4 then 'Phone (all)' end as TYPE, r.D2INTERACTIONSTATUS FROM dbo.USR_D2_CAMPAIGN_BUSINESSPROCESS_RESULTS r join dbo.CONSTITUENT c on r.SPONSORLOOKUPID = c.LOOKUPID
